extensionDescription.message: DontBugMe allows you to easily use credentials from BugMeNot.com on any page.

popupNoAccounts.message: It looks like there are no logins availible for this page.
popupNoAccounts.description: Message shown, when no credentials are availible

popupInfo.message: Click any result to fill it into the page.

popupAutoSubmit.description: Checkbox in popup to enable auto-submitting

popupProvidedBy.message: Results provided by BugMeNot.com. This extension is not affiliated with BugMeNot.
